arts.ttl: Silko Thomas on his pivotal role in Wigan Athletic's victory at Barnsley - 'I know my ability'
arts.sum: Silko Thomas could not hide his delight at laying on Wigan Athletic's winning goal at Barnsley - and ensuring the team 'gets the best out of me'.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief hails vital victory at Barnsley - and explains surprise team selection
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney felt Wigan Athletic's backs-to-the-wall victory at Barnsley was no more than his players deserved.

arts.ttl: Thelo Aasgaard gives Wigan victory at Barnsley
Familiar faces stand between Wigan Athletic and Wembley dream after trophy draw
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic will face a number of their former favourites next month after the round 32 draw of the Vertu Trophy – the new name for the Bristol Street Motors Trophy – handed them a trip to League Two outfit Chesterfield.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Eight changes in our expected team v Barnsley
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Barnsley.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic ace tipped to go 'all the way to the top' by Barnsley man - 'People maybe don't realise or appreciate...'
arts.sum: Stephen Humphrys admits he'll have his work cut out getting the better of an 'absolutely unbelievable' opponent in Sam Tickle when Barnsley face Wigan Athletic this weekend.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - 'We have reached a critical juncture in the season...'
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts are desperate for the end of the international break...and the chance for their side to move up the League One table – starting this weekend at our old friends, Barnsley...

arts.ttl: What Wigan Athletic boss ‘ordered’ of Sam Tickle during international break!
arts.sum: Sam Tickle was ordered to use the international break recharging his batteries in the Lake District to ensure he's ready to help kickstart Wigan Athletic's campaign at Barnsley this weekend!

arts.ttl: Preview: Barnsley vs. Wigan Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Barnsley and Wigan Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss on challenge of facing 'best player in division' at Barnsley
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney and Wigan Athletic will not need to be warned of the biggest threat Barnsley will pose this weekend.
